properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana Yesu kazaliwa,
tumwimbie kwa furaha,
aleluya.
Aleluya aleluya
aleluya aleluya
aleluya.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kwa ajili yetu sisi,
amezaliwa kitoto,
aleluya.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Amezaliwa kitoto,
nasi tumepewa mwana,
aleluya.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Utawala na uwezo,
vimo mabegani mwake,
aleluya.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jina lake ndilo Baba,
wa milele tena mfalme,
aleluya.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Enzi yake ya kifalme,
haitakuwa na mwisho,
aleluya.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Anakalia kitiye,
chake Daudi babaye,
aleluya.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Furaha binti Sayuni,
umpokee Bwana wako,
aleluya.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Dunia na ifurahi,
nchi na ishangilie,
aleluya.
